{{Wireless embedded system |brand=4ipnet |model=HSG200 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/23/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=LanReady |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=SCD020067 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU121622DTP-D43 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HSG200-1,HSG200-2 |default_ssid_regex=^HSG200-1$,,,^HSG200-2$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Wireless Hotspot Gateway''
[http://www.4ipnet.com/file/en/products_datasheet/HSG200_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] "FN3A" and "REV:1.2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This is a '''LanReady''' OEM product. The FCC test report lists additional models identified by this FCC ID. They are as follows.. *3 Port **Cenwell CHG-920X **LanReady AC920X **Wavecore WV-200HS **TRENDnet TEW-656HG **Pheenet WAS-105R **Airlink101 AR700HSN **Cerio WMR-200N **4ipnet HSG200 **Cipherium W1110 **LevelOne WHG-1000 **Kozumi K-500HPG **Wiborne HSG-100 **USC W1110 **RayTalk RA-5n5 **Cenwell CAP-952X **LanReady AP952X **Wavecore WV-100IA **Pheenet WAP-854NP **Cerio WM-200N **Kozumi K-520WPG **Wiborne WAP-100 *2 Port **4ipnet EAP200 **4ipnet EAP206 **Cipherium A210 **Cipherium A216 **USC A210 **USC A216 **RayTalk RA-1000 **(not listed, redirects to LanReady FCC ID) OvisLink AirLive WIAS-3200N (FCC ID: ODMWIAS32N) Per '''4ipnet''''s manual... *192.168.1.254 IP for the Private subnet, no authentication required, admin:admin credentials *192.168.11.254 IP for the Public subnet, authentication required *Default SSIDs of '''HSG200-1''' (private, disabled by default, however?) and '''HSG200-2''' (public) **WiGLE shows a few HSG200-2 SSIDs - w/ 06:1F:D4 (4) or 06:11:6B (1) OUIs
